elements.expression: backers[msg.sender][_index].prepaid == true && backers[msg.sender][_index].claimed == false && backers[msg.sender][_index].tokenAmount == _tokenAmount && backers[msg.sender][_index].tokenPrice == _boughtTokensPrice && backers[msg.sender][_index].privateHash == sha3()(_privatePhrase,msg.sender) && backers[msg.sender][_index].backerRank == _backerRank
